author: Happy Amazon Shopper

review: I toggled between Comcast and Fire TV for a month. The Fire TV packaging is very Apple/Tiffany's-elegant! The fit and finish of the hardware is high quality (I even bought the game controller). Setup was easy, and if you have a blue light on the front panel after you've turned your TV off, remember to press the Home button and the Fire TV will go to sleep after a while. Unexpected pleasure--ordering apps at Amazon.com for the Fire TV and what...yep...they show up on the Fire TV when I get there. I've downloaded the History Channel, Smithsonian, Netflix--it's like I have a cable box just for me!  I am running 100mb Internet and don't have any problems with speed. I am just upset that I kept spending $166 on Comcast when I could have had this. p.s. the virtual fireplace adds a bit of ambiance to the room when I am working at home. Amazon: thank you, I love this thing.
author: Eric Scott Taylor, IV
